name: Stuck in a drum loop
description:
This game is an experiment done in 72hs for for Ludum Dare 47 game jam. Theme: Stuck in a loop. The goal is to collect all drum parts (the purple blocks). Each time a new drum part is collected its associated track starts playing and the beat gets faster. Press start game and use Arrow Keys to move. Good Luck!

If it doesn't work on itch it can be played here: https://stuckinadrumloop.aboni.dev/

LD Entry page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/$227611
Source code: https://github.com/ajboni/ld47-stuck-in-a-drum-loop
